entry.title: Configuration-1
entry.content:
Modification

  • Global configurations:
    • Footer removed
    • Font size changed to 18
    • Scaffold for post modified
    • Set Language to EN
    • Modify time format
  • Post page configurations:
    • Add author in meta information
    • Enable sidebar
    • Modify time format
    • Remove copyright notice
  • Article configurations:
    • Add tags and assign categories
    • Add title image
    • Set individual banner image
